DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to compare the efficacy of levosimendan with that of dobutamine in patients with unstable hemodynamics (shock).
DOC.brief_title: Levosimendan Versus Dobutamine in Shock Patients
DOC.criteria: Reduced left ventricular systolic function Hypotension Anuria or oligouria Less than 18 years old Pregnant Uncorrected valvular stenosis Hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy (HOCM) Third degree AV block
